body: Hi Sajad, As you probably know this, In LB & HB components,The "Required" Inputs has only one "_underline" before their names (left side). It is needed to connect all of the _required inputs of components to run. In this attachment, _zonedata (from "Read EP Result component) is not connected, then set boolean to true. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/offRlRpFlkjFtcdqp7C2G7WXB9rr*pcOBWvkDy*kk-XAUw8tE1o1QyX2Kl23TJn5-Kuz8G54w7*on5b38Mpht9nnf1oLM5mE/screenshot_20161013_142855.jpg)Regards, -Omid
